title: FS: Large lot of PSA graded t206s (mostly 2s and 3s) - SOLD!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: Large lot of PSA graded t206s (mostly 2s and 3s) - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
I hate to do this already, but if I'm going to have a realistic chance at completing my e98 set (only a Cobb away....lol), then I had better do it now while I'm only 17 cards into my t206 set.  I can always start it over again, right?

I'd really like to unload in one lot so that I can move on more quickly and work with just one person...HOWEVER, if a couple days go by and no one goes after them all, then I will exercise the possibility of smaller lots and/or individuals.

Looking to get $875 shipped for the lot.  E-mail or PM with questions.  I can take some pics for you for ones you might want to see.  Sorry, but scanner and laptop do not like each other, so I have to take pics with my ipad. 

Jimi
